```{r}
output$reg <- renderPlotly({
         model<- as.formula(paste(input$y, " ~ ", input$x))
        fit <- glm(model, data = Backpack)
        ggplot(data = Backpack, aes_string(x = input$x, y = input$y)) +
            geom_point() + 
            geom_smooth(method = "glm") +
            theme_bw()})
```
